benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/credits - Create a credit

covered: Valid Payload scenarios: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC07 demonstrate successful creation with required fields, multiple items, explicit invoice, auto-commit, and no-invoice scenarios.

Invalid Payload and Input Validation: TC11 (malformed JSON), TC12 (missing required fields), TC14 (invalid accountId format), TC15 (unsupported currency), TC16 (invalid pluginProperty type), TC19 (SQL injection), TC20 (XSS payload in headers) cover input validation and security.
Duplicate Submission / Idempotency: TC30 demonstrates idempotent behavior for repeated requests.
Large Payloads / Boundary Conditions: TC23 (max credits in one request) and TC24 (very large payload) test payload size and limits.
General Validation / Error Handling: TC08 and TC09 tests 404 for missing account or invoice; TC17 (503 system unavailable); TC28 (plugin unavailable); TC29 (plugin error).
Authorization: TC18 covers 403 for insufficient permissions.
Edge Case Scenarios: TC21 (empty body), TC22 (extra fields), TC07 (no invoiceId) and TC26/TC27 state variations show robustness with varied inputs and account state.
Integration & Plugin Behavior: TC28 and TC29 cover plugin integration behavior and error handling.
Performance: TC32 (response time under normal load), TC33 (peak load) and TC34 (stress/resource utilization).
Regression: TC30 idempotency and TC31 backward compatibility tests ensure existing behavior remains stable.
Accessibility: TC35 ensures API docs and accessibility considerations.
gaps: Rate limiting/throttling tests (e.g., 429) are not present.
Caching behavior tests (ETag/Cache-Control) are not present.
Missing explicit 401 Unauthorized test (only 403 for insufficient permissions).
Explicit 500 Internal Server Error case is not directly defined (plugin errors may map to 500 but no dedicated test).
recommendations: Add a test for 401 Unauthorized to verify authentication is required.
Add rate-limiting tests (429) to ensure the API handles bursts or abuse.
Add explicit 500 Internal Server Error test case for server-side failures.
Add caching tests for ETag/Cache-Control headers and behavior on repeated GETs after POST.
Consider testing pagination in batch POST responses if the API supports it, or clarify that pagination is not applicable for POST payloads.
Enhance edge-case coverage with very long reason/comment strings and unusual header values; include security-focused tests for XSS in payload as well.
